text: Phir kya tum logon ne yeh samajh rakkha hai ke yunhi jannat ka daakhila tumhein mil jayega, halaanke abhi tumpar woh sab kuch nahin guzra hai jo tumse pehle iman laney walon par guzar chuka hai? Unpar sakhtiyan guzri, museebatein aayi, hila maarey gaye, hatta ke waqt ka Rasool aur uske saathi ehle iman cheekh utthey ke Allah ki madad kab aayegi, us waqt unhein tasalli di gayi ke haan Allah ki madad qareeb hai
